paper_title.ja: 生涯学習施設における講座諸室のオープン化の試行に関する考察
paper_title.en: A STUDY ON OPEN LECTURE ROOMS IN THE LIFELONG LEARNING FACILITIES

description.ja: The purpose of this paper is to make clear the significance of open lecture rooms in lifelong learning facilities. The users learning in the closed rooms are positive toward open rooms. The troubles hardly happen even in the actual case of learning in the open space. Various interactions between the learners and passersby are created through the openess. Learning activity spreads out in the surroundings functionally, spatially. Correlation between lecture rooms and surrounding space which aren't disturbed each other by the sight, noise, atmosphere and so on is to be designed for facilitating such effect of the Open Space.
description.en: The purpose of this paper is to make clear the significance of open lecture rooms in lifelong learning facilities. The users learning in the closed rooms are positive toward open rooms. The troubles hardly happen even in the actual case of learning in the open space. Various interactions between the learners and passersby are created through the openess. Learning activity spreads out in the surroundings functionally, spatially. Correlation between lecture rooms and surrounding space which aren't disturbed each other by the sight, noise, atmosphere and so on is to be designed for facilitating such effect of the Open Space.

paper_title.ja: 生涯学習施設におけるコモンスペースの評価に関する研究-複合化による新たな機能創出に向けてのコモンスペースの役割-
paper_title.en: EVALUATION ON THE COMMON SPACE OF THE LIFELONG LEARNING FACILITIES : The roles of the common space to create the new complexed functions

description.ja: The characteristics of using the Common Space of the lifelong learning facilities are addressed to make clear the correlation between the space and the usage and to analyze the significance of the Common Space. The Common Space is the cue to create a new complexed function which encourages the learning activities more relaxed, elastic and different from those in the space with a specinc function. And also it makes the usage of the space more spontaneous and diverse. Various places articulated and connected by each other is to be designed for facilitating such roles of the Common Space.
description.en: The characteristics of using the Common Space of the lifelong learning facilities are addressed to make clear the correlation between the space and the usage and to analyze the significance of the Common Space. The Common Space is the cue to create a new complexed function which encourages the learning activities more relaxed, elastic and different from those in the space with a specinc function. And also it makes the usage of the space more spontaneous and diverse. Various places articulated and connected by each other is to be designed for facilitating such roles of the Common Space.

paper_title.en: THEME OF THE WORKSHOP THROUGH THE PROGRESSIVE ADVANCEMENT FROM IMPROVEMENT OF LIVING ENVIRONMENTS TO COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT : A case study on the improvement of S-district in Chikusino

description.ja: The first purpose of this paper is to evaluate individual participation in the planning and improving process of living environments through the workshop method. The second is to make clear the correlation between durability of community development and actual participation. Though workshop corresponds to people with active attitude delicately, there are many passive people who entrusted others with the plan by the workshop. Therefore it is necessary for improvement of living environments to have "the individual correspondence worked together with the workshop" and "durable workshop based on the small community".
description.en: The first purpose of this paper is to evaluate individual participation in the planning and improving process of living environments through the workshop method. The second is to make clear the correlation between durability of community development and actual participation. Though workshop corresponds to people with active attitude delicately, there are many passive people who entrusted others with the plan by the workshop. Therefore it is necessary for improvement of living environments to have "the individual correspondence worked together with the workshop" and "durable workshop based on the small community".

paper_title.ja: 公営住宅における住み手の自主的増改築の考察-住み手主体の集住環境生成に関する研究
paper_title.en: RESIDENTS' EXTENTION AND REFURBISHMENT ON THE PUBLIC HOUSINGS : Research on the environment of living-together generated by residents' autonomy

description.ja: Extention and refurbishment on public housing units built by the residents are addressed to examine their characteristics and significance relating the original planning method. Residents' autonomous transaction with the living environments stratify the diverse and matured place with sense of living and individuality on the uniform space heteronomously origined. The planning theory is to be shifted from prescribing and instructing the way of living to generating the living values autonomously, which follows as a logical consequence that planning and space are reserved and appropriated to the residents.
description.en: Extention and refurbishment on public housing units built by the residents are addressed to examine their characteristics and significance relating the original planning method. Residents' autonomous transaction with the living environments stratify the diverse and matured place with sense of living and individuality on the uniform space heteronomously origined. The planning theory is to be shifted from prescribing and instructing the way of living to generating the living values autonomously, which follows as a logical consequence that planning and space are reserved and appropriated to the residents.

paper_title.ja: 「状況づくり」の視点からみた参加型集住体計画の研究 : Mポートの基本計画・設計プロセスの考察
paper_title.en: SITUATED DESIGN IN THE CO-OPERATIVE HOUSING - A case study of the basic planning process of M-port project-

description.ja: Situated design is the planning method which addresses the latent value of planning process. The purpose of this paper is to make clear the significance of situated design, residents' sense of living together inspired by situated design, and the characteristics of interaction between person and physical environment through analysing the basic planning process of co-operative housing M-port. 1) Setting dialogue free makes participants to be quite in sympathy with each other, reaches gentle agreement of planning, and generates creative tension. 2) Situated learning, enjoying such action as, site watching and observation of other housings, imprints the life image and the meaning of living together on the form shows a strong tendency to succeed in this project. 3) Such situated design generates the elastic use of common space, leads participants to discovering metaphorical form of living together, and gives a house and common space individual character.
description.en: Situated design is the planning method which addresses the latent value of planning process. The purpose of this paper is to make clear the significance of situated design, residents' sense of living together inspired by situated design, and the characteristics of interaction between person and physical environment through analysing the basic planning process of co-operative housing M-port. 1) Setting dialogue free makes participants to be quite in sympathy with each other, reaches gentle agreement of planning, and generates creative tension. 2) Situated learning, enjoying such action as, site watching and observation of other housings, imprints the life image and the meaning of living together on the form shows a strong tendency to succeed in this project. 3) Such situated design generates the elastic use of common space, leads participants to discovering metaphorical form of living together, and gives a house and common space individual character.
